title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Spring in Iceland
content:
Photo submitted by Runar Omarrson, “Was aiming for some fun trails through lava rock close to the capital (Reykjavik) but had to change plans since the soil is still so wet. It is actually supposed to be winter here in Iceland but the south part of the country feels more like spring. It ended up […]

author: Kristi Benedict
